I found this out....

If you get files like .001 or .002 all you have to do is rename the all the files with r instead of the 0. Fo example if you have .001 and .002 just rename to .r01 .r02 They should change to winrar files. But note after I got to a certain part (around 20) the files did not trun into winrar files but if you extract the first file it will still work.

There is proably a easier way but thats the way I did it, and it worked.
seed pls
@dan_plus_o: Yeah.. the easier way is to open any of the files in WinRAR... '.001' for example..  associate it with WinRAR and you;ll be all set, no need to rename all the files....
